column3: It is necessary to remove duplicates in order to get unbaised results https://www.kaggle.com/shashanksai/textpreprocessingusingpython#
har row me 1 ya 0 hon gy, agar wo word sentence me hwa to <1> (chahy jitni dafa bhi is sentence me aaya ho, or agar ye ward sentence me nahi h to <0>
kitni dafa ye particuler word is sentence me aaya h, {0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7….}
